name: Awakened Zurkhwood
languages: one language known by its creator

traits.name: False Appearance
traits.desc: While the tree remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from a normal zurkhwood mushroom.

traits.name: Mute
traits.desc: If the awakened zurkhwood was created by a myconid sovereign, it can't speak.

actions.name: Slam
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 14 (3d6 + 4) bludgeoning damage.
